subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nashville goalie Chris Mason made 30 saves to end a seven-game personal losing streak against the Blackhawks, and Alexander Radulov and Jason Arnott each had a goal and an assist in the Predators’ 5-2 victory in Chicago.
snippet: Nashville goalie Chris Mason made 30 saves to end a seven-game personal losing streak against the Blackhawks, and Alexander Radulov and Jason Arnott each had a goal and an assist in the Predators’ 5-2 victory in Chicago.
